name: Random animal
description: Simple app utilizing two different API's to fetch random pictures of cat and dogs. Primary goal was to get familiar with styled components.

name: Weather App
description: What better way to learn a new framework than to build an weather app! The app uses the Open Weather Map API to fetch current weather.

name: Budget Planner
description: An app where you can enter your income and expenses. Built as an homage to my very first code project ever!
